title: The Song of Bernadette
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: In 1858 France, a peasant girl named Bernadette Soubirous has visions of the Virgin Mary in a grotto in Lourdes.

title: Shadow of a Doubt
description: A young girl, overjoyed when her favorite uncle comes to visit the family, slowly begins to suspect that he is in fact the 'Merry Widow' murderer sought by the authorities.

title: The Ox-Bow Incident
description: Two drifters are passing through a Western town when news arrives that a local rancher has been murdered and his cattle stolen. The townspeople join a posse to catch the perpetrators.

title: For Whom the Bell Tolls
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role (Katina Paxinou)
description: During the Spanish Civil War, an American allied with the Republicans finds romance during a desperate mission to blow up a strategically important bridge.

title: Heaven Can Wait
description: A playboy arrives at the gates of Hell to recount his life of debauchery to Satan to prove he belongs there, but his story suggests otherwise.

title: The Life and Death of Colonel Blimp
description: Portrays in flashback the life of a British soldier from his youth in the Boer War to his professional obsolescence in World War II.

title: I Walked with a Zombie
description: A Canadian nurse is hired to care for the wife of a sugar plantation owner on a Caribbean island, where she encounters voodoo and zombies.

title: Watch on the Rhine
description: A German couple flees the Nazis and settles in the United States, only to find that they are still being pursued by agents of the Third Reich.

title: The More the Merrier
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role (Charles Coburn)
description: During the World War II housing shortage in Washington D.C., two men rent a room in a woman's apartment, leading to romantic complications.

title: Phantom of the Opera
description: A disfigured violinist haunts the Paris Opera House and secretly aids the career of a beautiful young soprano.

title: Lassie Come Home
description: After her destitute family is forced to sell her, a collie named Lassie escapes from her new owner and begins the long trek from Scotland to her Yorkshire home.

title: Sahara
description: After the fall of Tobruk, a sergeant leads a tank crew across the desert and tries to defend a fortress at an oasis against a German battalion.

title: The Seventh Victim
description: A woman goes in search of her missing sister in New York's Greenwich Village, and uncovers a Satanic cult.

title: The Leopard Man
description: A black leopard escapes from a show in a New Mexico nightclub and is blamed for the mauling deaths of several women, but the police suspect a human killer.

title: Day of Wrath
description: In a 17th-century Danish village, an old woman is accused of witchcraft; in the shadow of her flight, the pastor's young wife falls in love with his son from a previous marriage.

title: Ossessione
description: A tramp begins an affair with the wife of a restaurant owner and they plot to murder her husband. A precursor to Italian Neorealism based on 'The Postman Always Rings Twice'.

title: Le Corbeau
description: A French village doctor becomes the target of a series of poison-pen letters signed by 'The Raven'.

title: Cabin in the Sky
description: A compulsive gambler dies during a fight, but his wife's prayers grant him a six-month reprieve to prove he is worthy of entering Heaven.

title: Stormy Weather
description: A musical variety show featuring some of the greatest African-American entertainers of the era, loosely based on the life of Bill 'Bojangles' Robinson.

title: The Human Comedy
description: A teenager in a small California town works as a telegram messenger during World War II, delivering news of joy and sorrow to the community.

title: Girl Crazy
description: A playboy is sent to a small college in the west where he falls for the dean's daughter and tries to save the school from closure by putting on a show.

title: The Gang's All Here
description: A soldier on leave falls for a showgirl, but their romance is complicated by his previous engagement and a case of mistaken identity, all set to lavish musical numbers.

title: Jane Eyre
description: After a harsh childhood, orphan Jane Eyre is hired by Edward Rochester, the brooding lord of a mysterious manor house, to care for his young daughter.

title: Old Acquaintance
description: Two friends, both writers, have a jealous and competitive relationship spanning twenty years as they deal with love, career, and family.

title: Five Graves to Cairo
description: After the fall of Tobruk, a British corporal assumes the identity of a waiter at a hotel used by the German High Command to spy on Erwin Rommel.

title: So Proudly We Hail!
description: The story of a group of Red Cross nurses who show bravery and sacrifice during the Battle of Bataan and Corregidor in World War II.

title: Madame Curie
description: A biographical film about Marie and Pierre Curie and their discovery of radium.

title: Princess O'Rourke
description: A princess in exile in New York falls in love with an American pilot who doesn't know her royal identity.

title: Holy Matrimony
description: A famous painter assumes the identity of his dead valet to escape publicity, but complications ensue when he gets married.

title: This Land Is Mine
description: A cowardly schoolteacher in a Nazi-occupied town finds his courage when he is accused of a murder he didn't commit.

title: Hangmen Also Die!
description: The assassin of Nazi leader Reinhard Heydrich tries to escape the Gestapo in Prague, aided by the local resistance.

title: Air Force
description: The crew of a B-17 bomber flies into Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941, and then participates in the Pacific campaign.

title: Destination Tokyo
description: A US submarine is sent on a secret mission to Tokyo Bay to gather information for the Doolittle Raid.

title: Action in the North Atlantic
description: A Merchant Marine ship is torpedoed by a U-boat, and the survivors sign on to a new ship to transport vital supplies to Russia through dangerous waters.

title: Edge of Darkness
description: The residents of a small Norwegian fishing village secretly organize a revolt against the occupying Nazis.

title: Frankenstein Meets the Wolf Man
description: Larry Talbot (The Wolf Man) seeks a cure for his lycanthropy and finds Frankenstein's Monster instead.

title: Son of Dracula
description: Count Alucard arrives in the American South at the invitation of a woman obsessed with the occult.

title: A Guy Named Joe
description: A reckless pilot is killed in action but returns as a ghost to mentor a young pilot and guide him in love and war.

title: The Outlaw
description: Western legends Pat Garrett, Doc Holliday, and Billy the Kid are played against each other over the law and the attentions of sultry Rio McDonald.

title: Tender Comrade
description: A group of war wives live communally in a large house and work in a defense plant while waiting for their husbands to return.

title: Bataan
description: A diverse group of thirteen American soldiers stay behind to defend a bridge on the Bataan Peninsula against the Japanese army.

title: Coney Island
description: In 1905, a saloon singer becomes the center of a rivalry between two nightclub owners at the famous amusement park.
